mods.abstract: MISSING. A negro boy, named TOM, aged 11 years, was sent on Sunday last from Jeanerette to Franklin, since which time he has not been heard of. He rode a large grey mare, is black and very straight, and wore a blue check sac, yellow-striped pants, and an oilcloth cap. Any information concerning him will be thankfully received by the owner. MRS. C. G. RICHARDSON. June 3, 1850. tf
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )

detail.title: The Planters' banner. : (Franklin, Attakapas Co., Lou.) 1849-1872

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
